channel.title: Server
channel.description:
So many coders, with so many ideas, how come no one can seem to make a [b]good[/b] RSC server?
Stop making servers 'the closest thing to rsc' if you want to play a server like that, go p2p a character or even buy one off someone and play the original rsc.
Try something new, edit the landscapes, edit some npc's, but still keep it rsc.
Is it too much to ask?
I'd attempt to make one myself, but i don't know a thing about editing/coding.
I just know i'm getting tired of the same servers, and i know alot of other people are.
So please someone, do everyone a favor and make a new, exciting server!

item.title: Server
item.dc:creator: @stee stee
item.description:
@stee wrote:

[quote=“johno2, post:16, topic:290221”][quote author=stee link=topic=383644.msg2879676#msg2879676 date=1248265498]
So many coders, with so many ideas, how come no one can seem to make a good RSC server?

Stop making servers ‘the closest thing to rsc’ if you want to play a server like that, go p2p a character or even buy one off someone and play the original rsc.

Try something new, edit the landscapes, edit some npc’s, but still keep it rsc.

Is it too much to ask?

I’d attempt to make one myself, but i don’t know a thing about editing/coding.

I just know i’m getting tired of the same servers, and i know alot of other people are.

So please someone, do everyone a favor and make a new, exciting server!
[/quote]

Well, if you can’t program, then why are you here slagging peoples shit off, when you can’t do better?

Maybe, you should show some “good” work, then i will take this back…

If not, i suggest your “shut up”[/quote]

LOL. i love the “abbreviations”

I was stating a point, i wasn’t “slagging” anyone off.

Do you even play any of the RSC private servers that are about? If you did then “you” will see why I put this point across.

Thanks for “reading”

Read full topic

So many coders, with so many ideas, how come no one can seem to make a good RSC server?

Stop making servers ‘the closest thing to rsc’ if you want to play a server like that, go p2p a character or even buy one off someone and play the original rsc.

Is it too much to ask?

I’d attempt to make one myself, but i don’t know a thing about editing/coding.

I just know i’m getting tired of the same servers, and i know alot of other people are.

So please someone, do everyone a favor and make a new, exciting server!
[/quote]

Well, if you can’t program, then why are you here slagging peoples shit off, when you can’t do better?

Maybe, you should show some “good” work, then i will take this back…

If not, i suggest your “shut up”[/quote]

There is nothing wrong with requesting that someone comes out with a good server, Mr 508. You don’t belong in this section, and I’m doubting if you know how to program yourself.

Read full topic

item.title: Server
item.dc:creator: @z21 z2
item.description:
@z21 wrote:

Jessekinss:

Anyways, even if someone does come out with a kick-ass server, people are just too stupid to see the potential in it. And not everyone likes the same ideas. Even if you pulled a bunch of decent programmers together, there’s no guarantee anyone would play it.

Very well put and a good point

Read full topic

item.title: Server
item.dc:creator: @Jessekinss Jessekinss
item.description:
@Jessekinss wrote:

I still have 2 RSC accounts left. Just throwing that out there.

Someone mentioned that there were 50ish people on RSC, how is that a bad thing? Most of these servers don’t even maintain 20. True it’s boring, that they only stake on there, but staking is everywhere. That was a really bad point to who ever said that.

Anyways, even if someone does come out with a kick-ass server, people are just too stupid to see the potential in it. And not everyone likes the same ideas. Even if you pulled a bunch of decent programmers together, there’s no guarantee anyone would play it.

Read full topic

@mapu wrote:

I got something like you’re describing.

Recruiting people for the project at the moment, have everything for the server just need a team to do it with us.

My sig for signup.

item.title: Server
item.dc:creator: @videoman1994 videoman1994
item.description:
@videoman1994 wrote:

I agree with you stee, most of the servers have “some” good features, if we could combine servers with good sides to them all, we could be then getting somewhere, Support on opinion.

Read full topic

item.title: Server
item.dc:creator: @stee stee
item.description:
@stee wrote:

Very true.
And congratulations on running a very successful server.

The point i’m trying getting across is, alot of servers that are now dead had some really, really good features about them.
I just think its possible to combine some of the ideas and make a new server.

(So anyone else got 3 characters on rsc, or is it just me?)

Read full topic

item.title: Server
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

stee, the reason theres servers like mine with things like ‘the closest thing to rsc’ is because nobody can access the real P2P. even if you pay money, you can’t access it, less than 1% of pserver uses can actually get on, and even then it’s a dead game with 50 players or so.

Read full topic
